speak_instruction: Press, then read the sentence aloud
listen_instruction: Press, then listen to the sentence
accent_explanation: How would you describe your accent?
why_is_it_important_text: Anonymized user data like age, gender, and accent helps improve the audio data used to train the accuracy of speech recognition engines. Your username and email will never be associated with your submitted data, and you can choose whether to make your username public or anonymous.
need_change_help: Need help with gender or gender identity change?
need_change_help_text: We are providing more options to give people more choice in what they say about their gender or gender identity. Please describe yourself in the way that feels most natural to you. Find out more about our approach to sex and gender.
accent_help: Do you need help with an accent?
accent_help_text: Your accent is the way you pronounce words. It may depend on the place where you live or live, the languages ​​you speak and many other factors. Here you can specify the information about him that you consider necessary.
accent_input_placeholder: Start typing to describe your accent
profile_title_text: By providing some data about yourself, you make the audio data you send to Open Voice more useful to speech recognition engines, which will use that data to improve their accuracy.
change_mail_text: To change or edit your email, write us a letter at
your_lang_not_in_language_text: Your language is not yet represented in Open Voice?
submit_a_report_text: What issues are you experiencing with this sentence?
offensive_language_text: The sentence has disrespectful or offensive language.
grammar_error_text: The sentence has a grammatical or spelling error.
foreign_language_text: It is written in a language different than what I'm speaking.
difficult_to_pronounce_text: It contains words or phrases that are hard to read or pronounce.
page_not_found_text: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
tooltip_speak: Read the suggestions to help AI learn.
tooltip_listen: Check the correct pronunciation of the sentences
tooltip_about: Learn more about the Open Voice project
help_discord: Help us find more people willing to record their voice!
news_subscription: Subscribe to the Open Voice newsletter, goal reminders, and progress updates
accept_terms: I agree to how you process this information in accordance with the Open Voice Privacy Policy
ILLUSTRATION_1_TEXT: Record your voice and add to the open database for the Kazakh language. With your help, artificial intelligence can speak and listen to Kazakh.
add_text_license: The sentences provided here will be added to a public dataset
how_do_i_quote_text: Cite with a URL or the full title of the work. If it's your own words, just say "Self-citation." We need to know where you found this content so we can make sure it's in the public domain and free of copyright restrictions.
sentence_domain_placeholder: Select three domains that best describe your sentence
write_policy: * I confirm that this sentence is in the public domain and I have permission to upload it.
profile_download_title: Do you want to download your data?
profile_download_text: Let us know if you want to download:
profile_info_download_text: Includes email, username, and demographic information. Available now.
entries_download_text: Includes mp3 and related sentences. May take some time to prepare.
profile_delete_title: Do you want your voice recordings to be removed as well, or do you want to keep them in the Open Voice dataset?*
leave_info: Your anonymous voice recordings will remain in the Open Voice dataset. After deleting your profile, you will no longer be able to submit a request to remove your recordings from the dataset
delete_info: We will review your request to remove your voice recordings from the dataset. If your request is approved, we will contact those who uploaded the dataset and ask them to remove your voice recordings.

HERO.TITLE: Open Voice Data Collection Platform
HERO.DESCRIPTION: A fully open-source platform where organizations and individuals collaborate to build comprehensive voice datasets for language development.

OPEN_SOURCE.TITLE: 100% Open Source
OPEN_SOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Our entire platform is open source, allowing complete transparency and community-driven development.

ORG_ACCESS.TITLE: Organization Access
ORG_ACCESS.DESCRIPTION: Organizations can request full access to our services and contribute to voice data collection.

DATA_ACCESS.TITLE: Open Data Access
DATA_ACCESS.DESCRIPTION: Access and download voice datasets while maintaining privacy and ethical standards.

STEP1.TITLE: Submit Request
STEP1.DESCRIPTION: Fill out a simple form to request organizational access to our platform.

STEP2.TITLE: Get Verified
STEP2.DESCRIPTION: We review your organization's request to ensure alignment with our open-source values.

STEP3.TITLE: Full Access
STEP3.DESCRIPTION: Once approved, get complete access to our voice data collection tools and datasets.

CTA.TITLE: Be Part of Open Voice Development
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Whether you're an individual contributor or an organization, join us in building the future of voice technology.

HERO.TITLE: Why Open Voice?
HERO.DESCRIPTION_1: Open Voice is a publicly accessible voice dataset created from volunteer voices worldwide. People who want to create voice applications can use this dataset to train machine learning models.
HERO.DESCRIPTION_2: Currently, most voice datasets are owned by companies, which limits innovation. Voice datasets are also dominated by English-speaking males. This means voice technology doesn't work for many languages, and where it does work, it may not work equally well for everyone. We want to change this by encouraging people from around the world to share their voice.

GLOBAL.TITLE: Global Accessibility
GLOBAL.DESCRIPTION: Making voice technology accessible to everyone, regardless of language or background.

OPEN.TITLE: Open Source
OPEN.DESCRIPTION: All our code and data are open source, enabling transparency and community-driven development.

INNOVATION.TITLE: Driving Innovation
INNOVATION.DESCRIPTION: Empowering organizations and developers to create inclusive voice technologies.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How Open Voice Works
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION: We're creating a crowdsourced open voice dataset. Help with your voice, verify others' recordings, make the dataset better for everyone.

STEP1.TITLE: Language Request
STEP1.DESCRIPTION: Someone requests to add a language.

STEP2.TITLE: Website Localization
STEP2.DESCRIPTION: Website text is translated into that language.

STEP3.TITLE: Community Building
STEP3.DESCRIPTION: We gather a community of speakers and contributors.

STEP4.TITLE: Language Launch
STEP4.DESCRIPTION: We launch Open Voice in that language.

STEP5.TITLE: Voice Sharing
STEP5.DESCRIPTION: People come and share their voices.

FINAL.TITLE: Dataset Release
FINAL.DESCRIPTION: We publish the dataset every 3 months.

CTA.TITLE: Join the Voice Revolution
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Your voice can help make technology more inclusive and accessible for everyone.

FORM.TITLE: Add Your Organization
FORM.DESCRIPTION: Share your organization's details with us and we'll get back to you soon.
FORM.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
FORM.SUCCESS: Thank you! We'll review your submission and get back to you soon.
FORM.ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again later.
